name: Ricetta: pollame alla straniera
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Imported Poultry.

value.name: Pollame
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Melonlavanda
value.desc: Un frutto dal colore vivace. Se cucinata, la sua polpa si trasforma in pietanze dal sapore unico per il palato.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Uovo d'uccello
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Pollame alla straniera
value.desc: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. The fowl is marinated before being covered in batter and fried, and a thick sauce is drizzled over it as a finishing touch. The accompanying vegetables are local produce, but the marinating methods and sauce are all imported, hence the name "imported poultry."

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the World Quest "Gazing Three Thousand Miles Away"</color>
